description: This trap is sent each time a threshold on a PM condition
on an Ethernet Access Port is crossed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmEthernetAccPortThresholdCrossingAlert CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmEthernetAccPortThresholdIndex i 9999 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmEthernetAccPortThresholdInterval i 1 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmEthernetAccPortThresholdVariable o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmEthernetAccPortThresholdValueLo u 9999 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmEthernetAccPortThresholdValueHi u 9999 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmEthernetAccPortThresholdMonValue C 9999

description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the
cmEthernetAccPortThresholdTable.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmEthernetAccPortThresholdIndex

description: The interval over which monitored value is
sampled and compared with the specified threshold.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmEthernetAccPortThresholdInterval

description: The object identifier of the particular variable to be
sampled.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmEthernetAccPortThresholdVariable

description: Lower 32 bits of the threshold value.
Please note that in case of
cmEthernetAccPortStatsOPR, cmEthernetAccPortStatsOPT and cmEthernetAccPortStatsTEMP,
the values are 2's complement, since these could have negative values.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmEthernetAccPortThresholdValueLo

description: Higher 32 bits of the threshold value. Please note that in case of
cmEthernetAccPortStatsOPR, cmEthernetAccPortStatsOPT and cmEthernetAccPortStatsTEMP,
the values are 2's complement, since these could have negative values.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmEthernetAccPortThresholdValueHi

description: Monitored value corresponding to cmEthernetAccPortThresholdVariable.
Please note that in case of cmEthernetAccPortStatsOPR, cmEthernetAccPortStatsOPT
and cmEthernetAccPortStatsTEMP, the values are 2's complement, since these could be
negative values.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmEthernetAccPortThresholdMonValue

description: This trap is sent each time a threshold on a PM condition
on an Ethernet Network Port is crossed.

event.Summary: Ethernet network port performance threshold crossed

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e1t1ThresholdCrossingAlert CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e1t1ThresholdIndex i 9999 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e1t1ThresholdInterval i 1 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e1t1ThresholdVariable o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e1t1ThresholdValueLo u 9999 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e1t1ThresholdValueHi u 9999 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e1t1ThresholdMonValue C 9999

description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the
e1t1ThresholdTable.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e1t1ThresholdIndex

description: The interval over which monitored value is
sampled and compared with the specified threshold.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e1t1ThresholdInterval

description: The object identifier of the particular variable to be
sampled.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e1t1ThresholdVariable

description: Lower 32 bits of the threshold value.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e1t1ThresholdValueLo

description: Higher 32 bits of the threshold value.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e1t1ThresholdValueHi

description: Monitored value corresponding to e1t1ThresholdVariable.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e1t1ThresholdMonValue

description: This trap is sent each time a threshold on a PM condition
on an E3/T3 is crossed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e3t3ThresholdCrossingAlert CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e3t3ThresholdIndex i 9999 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e3t3ThresholdInterval i 1 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e3t3ThresholdVariable o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e3t3ThresholdValueLo u 9999 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e3t3ThresholdValueHi u 9999 CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e3t3ThresholdMonValue C 9999

description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the
e3t3ThresholdTable.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e3t3ThresholdIndex

description: The interval over which monitored value is
sampled and compared with the specified threshold.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e3t3ThresholdInterval

description: The object identifier of the particular variable to be
sampled.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e3t3ThresholdVariable

description: Lower 32 bits of the threshold value.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e3t3ThresholdValueLo

description: Higher 32 bits of the threshold value.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e3t3ThresholdValueHi

description: Monitored value corresponding to e3t3ThresholdVariable.
variables.name: CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::e3t3ThresholdMonValue

description: This trap is sent each time a pm period when the performance generation finished.
Note: only when cmPerQueryGenControl is enabled, this trap will be reported.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CM-PERFORMANCE-MIB::cmPerQueryGenTrap
